Uses of Class
rt.Spectrum

  • Packages that use Spectrum 
    Package Description
    rt
    Core classes and interfaces for an educational ray tracer.
    rt.films
    Implementations of the Film interface.
    rt.integrators
    Implementations of the Integrator interface.
    rt.lightsources
    Implementations of the LightGeometry interface.
    rt.materials
    Implementations of the Material interface.

      Constructors in rt.materials with parameters of type Spectrum 
      Constructor and Description
      Diffuse(Spectrum kd)
      Note that the parameter value is the diffuse reflectance, which should be in the range [0,1], a value of 1 meaning all light is reflected (diffusely), and none is absorbed.
